artist: Artist: Kawase Hasui; Publisher: Kawaguchi Jirō; Carver: Maeda Kentarō; Printer: Komatsu Wasankichi
inscription: bottom margin: 昭和四年拾月作 {Shōwa yonen jūgatsu saku} (made in October 1929)
markings: LL, red round artist\'s seal: 川セ {Kawase} | LR margin publisher\'s seal: カワグチ {Kawaguchi} | LL margin: 彫前田摺小松　版権所有 {hori Maeda suri Komatsu, hanken shoyū} (carved by Maeda, printed by Komatsu, copyright)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text:
On back: red seal 参百五拾枚限絶版、第一八七號 {sanbyakugojū mai kagiri zeppan, dai hyakuhachijūnana gō} (edition of 350, no. 187); stamp: MADE IN JAPAN. 
Second edition, published by Kawaguchi alone in the 1930s.
title: Snow around a Shrine
